definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (sub [[זית]] in Thes, = foregoing)—a Levite (Gershonite) 1Ch 23:8, appar. son of [[לַעְדָּן]] and brother of [[יְחִיאֵל]] and [[יוֹאֵל]]; 1Ch 26:22 appar. grandson of [[לַעְדָּן]], and son of [[יְחִיאֵלִי]] (expressly called brother of [[יוֹאֵל]]); LXX Zeqom, Zoqom, LXXL Zhqan.
